description:
Personal injury, motor vehicle accident, workers' compensation and criminal defense attorney Jason Carnell founded The Carnell Law Firm in Peachtree Corners, Georgia, to provide a higher level of customer service to individuals in the Atlanta area.

You Deserve Professional Representation

An accusation or arrest for criminal charges is a harrowing experience. Even for a misdemeanor DUI, you face the possibility of a year in jail, fines and court costs, community service and DUI "school." A conviction means you have a criminal record. Hiring an attorney is one of the biggest decisions of your life.

When you feel the power of the state bearing down on you, you don't want to end up searching nervously for your attorney's face in the gallery on your court date. When your court date arrives, you will know Jason Carnell's face and, more importantly, he will know yours.

He has handled hundreds of cases in counties throughout Georgia, including Fulton, DeKalb, Gwinnett, Forsyth and Cobb counties. He handles misdemeanor and felony criminal cases, with extensive experience in DUI, traffic offenses and battery charges.

Among the cases The Carnell Law Firm handles are:

  • Drug possession, sale and manufacture
  • Assault, battery, family violence battery, aggravated assault, aggravated battery
  • Driving under the influence (DUI) – O.C.G.A. §40-6-391
  • Theft of all types
  • Forgery – O.C.G.A. §16-9-1
  • Traffic offenses of all types
  • Reckless/disorderly conduct
  • School disciplinary hearings

Service. Satisfaction. Results.

Jason Carnell became a lawyer after over four years in the U.S. Air Force and two years of professional experience as a residential construction supervisor. From this, he's learned the value of customer and client service. He takes this obligation quite seriously. Jason's motto is "I'm in the customer service business, I just happen to practice law."

In a free, initial consultation, Mr. Carnell will take the time to meet with you, talk with you and answer your questions. You will know what to expect throughout your case. He offers competitive rates and flexible payment options for premium representation.
